meta._et_pb_old_content:
Access the Best IT, IT Financial and Scientific Talent

A&A understands the needs of your business, so we can make the best talent match to meet your contract and permanent placement requirements.

  • Access skilled professionals who make a positive impact on outcomes, starting on day one
  • Supplement your staff with carefully prescreened and qualified  candidates
  • Shorten time to procure difficult-to-find skill sets
  • Relieve the administrative burdens of being an employer

Service Options

Contract

Temporary professionals for assignments as required to complete projects and meet your specific business needs. Eliminate costly downtime and meet critical deadlines. Maintain adequate staff levels to provide seamless service and optimal results.

Contract-to-Permanent

Reduce the risks of filling permanent roles. Work with, evaluate and assess candidates before you extend an offer. Employees stay on our payroll until you’re sure they’re the right fit for your company and its culture.

Contingency Based/Direct Hire

Allow our team to recruit, screen and evaluate talent for your key permanent positions. Minimize the time and cost-to-hire by interviewing only the most qualified candidates. You pay for our services only if you hire a candidate we refer.  We back up our successful hires with a comprehensive guarantee.

Employer of Record

Place existing employees or new hires on our payroll. As their Employer of Record, we assume responsibility for the entire payroll process – including paying employees, and withholding and reporting taxes – to save you time, reduce administrative costs and manage risks.

Billing Services

If you find it increasingly difficult to maintain working capital for payroll purposes, A&A can help. We provide immediate access to critical funds, turning AR and other assets into capital you can use to keep your business on track.
